name: Steam - Better Avatar Borders
description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. ― This is a simple style that changes the appearance of the borders around users avatars to make them look more appealing. Version: 1.0.0 | View change logs (None available)

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: This style was created for my personal preferences to change the weird-looking borders around the users' avatars into something more thick and vibrant in colors. I don't know if that's just me but the original borders are looking kinda thin on a side and thicker on the other side along with a weird color tone to them. So I decided to change that and make them look appealing.
